content: Look for a lower path leading left of the Shrine, and you'll find a road leading along the ridge above the Towers of Karma into another wooded area. This place is effectively one big loop, with a lower and upper path to take.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Look for a lower path leading left of the Shrine, and you'll find a road leading along the ridge above the Towers of Karma into another wooded area. This place is effectively one big loop, with a lower and upper path to take.
